original_solution_mapping.L1: Wraps add 600*.25=<<600*.25=150>>150 pounds to his lift
original_solution_mapping.L2: So they add 150-30=<<150-30=120>>120 pounds more than sleeves

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1065.
    Returns: how much more pounds John gets out of wraps versus sleeves.
    """
    # L1
    raw_squat_weight = 600 # raw squat of 600 pounds
    wraps_percentage_increase = 0.25 # Wraps add 25%
    wraps_added_weight = raw_squat_weight * wraps_percentage_increase

    # L2
    sleeves_added_weight = 30 # Sleeves add 30 pounds
    difference_wraps_sleeves = wraps_added_weight - sleeves_added_weight

    # FA
    answer = difference_wraps_sleeves
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Wraps add {raw_squat_weight}*{wraps_percentage_increase}=<<{raw_squat_weight}*{wraps_percentage_increase}={wraps_added_weight}>>{wraps_added_weight} pounds to his lift
So they add {wraps_added_weight}-{sleeves_added_weight}=<<{wraps_added_weight}-{sleeves_added_weight}={difference_wraps_sleeves}>>{difference_wraps_sleeves} pounds more than sleeves

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Wraps add 600*0.25=<<600*0.25=150>>150 pounds to his lift
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So they add 600-30=<<600-30=570>>570 pounds more than sleeves

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'raw_squat_weight' (value: 600) was used instead of 'wraps_added_weight' (value: 150.0).
